comments.body:
why is this called HiveQLSQLBuilderSuite? 

We should move this to sql/core after https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/10583

comments.body: The name is mostly because currently we can only process logical plans directly translated from HiveQL query strings. Moving to sql/core sounds good.
